00075    do {
00076       if (millisec > 0) {
00077          FD_ZERO(&readfds);
00078          FD_SET(sock, &readfds);
00079 
00080          timeout.tv_sec = millisec / 1000;
00081          timeout.tv_usec = (millisec % 1000) * 1000;

00083          select(FD_SETSIZE, (void *) &readfds, NULL, NULL, (void *) &timeout);
00084 
00085          if (!FD_ISSET(sock, &readfds))
00086             break;

00088

00090 
00091       if (i <= 0)
00092          break;
00093

00095

00097          break;
